text: Urvashi Dholakia is an Indian Television Actress, known as Komolika of Kasautii Zindagii Kay. Dholakia has won many awards for her Komolika character. ==Indian Television Academy Awards== The Indian Television Academy Awards, also known as the (ITA Awards) is an annual event organised by the Indian Television Academy. The awards are presented in various categories, including popular programming (music, news, entertainment, sports, travel, lifestyle and fashion), best television channel in various categories, technical awards, and Best Performance awards. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="3"|2002 | Best Actress in Negative Role | rowspan="2"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="2"|Komolika Basu | |- | Best Actress-Drama (Popular) | rowspan="2" |- | Best Actress-Drama (Jury) | Kabhii Sautan Kabhii Sahelii | Sonia Harsh Pandya |- | rowspan="2"|2003 | Best Actress in Negative Role | rowspan="7"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="7"|Komolika Mojumdar | |- | Best Actress-Drama (Jury) | |- | 2004 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2005 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2006 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2007 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2010 | ITA Milestone Award | |- | 2017 | Best Actress in Negative Role | Chandrakanta (2017 TV series) | Rani Iravati | |} ==Indian Telly Awards== The 'Indian Telly Awards' are annual honours presented by the company of Indian Television to persons and organisations in the television industry of India. The Awards are given in several categories such as best programme or series in a specific genre, best television channel in a particular category, most popular actors and awards for technical roles such as writers and directors. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="3"|2002 | Best Actress in Negative Role | rowspan="2"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="2"|Komolika Basu | |- | Best Actress-Drama (Popular) | rowspan="2" |- | Best Actress-Drama (Jury) | Kabhii Sautan Kabhii Sahelii | Sonia Harsh Pandya |- | rowspan="1"|2003 | Best Actress in Negative Role | rowspan="7"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="7"|Komolika Basu | |- | 2004 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2005 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | rowspan="2"|2006 | Best Actress in Negative Role (Critics) | |- | Best Actress in Negative Role (Popular) | |- | 2007 | Best Actress in Negative Role | |- | 2010 | Best TV Vamp of Decade | |- |} ==Star International Awards== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | 2002 | Internationally Best TV Style Icon (Female) | rowspan="5"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | Komolika Basu | |- | rowspan="2"|2003 | Internationally Best TV Vamp | rowspan="2"|Komolika Basu | |- | Internationally Best TV Style Icon (Female) | |- | 2004 | Internationally Best TV Style Icon (Female) | Komolika Basu | |- | 2005 | Internationally Best TV Style Icon (Female) | Komolika Basu | |} ==Apsara Awards== The Apsara Film & Television Producers Guild Awards are presented annually by members of the Apsara Producers Guild to honour Excellence in film and television. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="1"|2006 | Best Actress in Television Drama Series | rowspan="2"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="2"|Komolika Basu | |- | 2007 | Best Actress in Television Drama Series | rowspan="1" |- |} ==Gold Awards== The Zee Gold Awards (also known as the Gold Television or Boroplus Awards) are honours presented excellence in the television industry. The Awards are given in several categories. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="2"|2007 | Best Actress in Negative Role (Popular) | rowspan="2"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="2"|Komolika Basu | |- | Best Actress in Negative Role (Critics) | rowspan="1" |} ==Sinsui Television Awards== Sinsui awards awarded the awards to the following members of Kasauti in 2006. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="1"|2006 | Best Actress in Negative Role (Popular) | rowspan="3"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="3"|Komolika Basu | |- | 2007 | Best Actress in Negative Role (Critics) | rowspan="1" |- | 2015 | Best Actress in Negative Role (Decade) | |} ==Kalakar Awards== The Kalakar Awards are given by Bengali Federation of India to honour the Best in Regional as well as Hindi television and cinema. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Category !Show !Character !Result |- | rowspan="1"|2003 | Favorite TV Actress | rowspan="1"|Kasautii Zindagii Kay | rowspan="1"|Komolika Basu | |- |} ==References== Urvashi Dholakia Category:Indian film actresses Category:Indian television actresses Urvashi Dholakia
